name: Market Mayhem
description:
Presentantion

This game was created for: Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
Our team is formed of  1 artist and 2 programmers.

The artist is Pixelz, itch.io page:

Programmers:

1) Aaryn, itch.io page: Aaryn's itch.io

2) Gizmo, itch.io page: Gizmo's itch.io

One week project made with Unity.

How to play?

You have to go through the shop and take the vegetables from the boxes, then shoot the green npcs (which are the customers) in order to make chaos, but watch out that the employers are coming for you.

The projectiles move in the direction of your cursor.
